properties.name: spring.websocket.bufferSize
properties.description: 缓冲区大小，需要带单位（KB/MB/GB)，默认为8KB.

properties.name: spring.websocket.codec
properties.description: 字节数据编码方式，可选值为Base32/Base62/Base64，默认为Base64.

properties.name: spring.websocket.ignore-exceptions
properties.description: 默认分发器忽略的异常列表.
